mapper.sql: Id, create_time, last_update_time, user_id, group_id, type, status
mapper.update: update u_group_user set status=0 where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into u_group_user (create_time, last_update_time, user_id, group_id, type, status) values ( #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update u_group_user set last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
